hero.title: Hello, I'm
hero.description: A developer passionate about turning ideas into code. My love for programming has led me to create engaging and responsive digital experiences, both for web and mobile platforms. I'm constantly seeking challenges to enhance my skills and make meaningful contributions to projects and companies, always prioritizing quality and innovation.

about.title: About Me
about.description: With a strong background in web and mobile development, spanning both frontend and backend, I specialize in advanced technologies such as React, React Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Prisma, Typescript, Redux, Testing Library, Jest, and Mocha. I leverage these tools to craft innovative and efficient solutions.
educations: IFMG Campus Formiga, High School - Informatics, 2016 - 2019
IFMG Campus Formiga, Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, 2020 - 2021
certifications: Fundamentals of Web Development Certificate - Trybe
Training Certificate in Full-Stack Development with specialization in Python - Trybe

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my email is always open. Send a message to whatever you want, I'll do my best to get in touch with you!
subject: Subject
Collaboration Opportunity
message: Hi, I'm interested in discussing a possible collaboration with you. Please let me know when you are available to talk. Thanks!
